text:
League 1
Amiens - Brest: which channel, what time?
Amiens receives Brest this Saturday, November 2 at 20h for the 12th day of Ligue 1.
02 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Coralie Room



Predrag Rajkoviƒá - ReimsAs every day of the championship, several individualities have distinguished themselves in Ligue 1. Discover the team-type of the weekend of the redaction.Icon Sport



Mohamed Simakan - StrasbourgIcon Sport



Thiago Silva - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Pablo Martinez - N√ÆmesIcon Sport



Ludovic Baal - BrestIcon Sport



Marco Verratti - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Paul Lasne - BrestIcon Sport



Angel Di Maria - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Yusuf Yazƒ±cƒ± - LilleIcon Sport



Mauro Icardi - Paris Saint-GermainIcon Sport



Wissam Ben Yedder - MonacoIcon Sport

Simakan, Di Maria, Yazici, ... The typical team of the weekend in Ligue 1!




Looking up. After 2 consecutive draws against Saint-Etienne (2-2) and Nimes (1-1), the Amiens must regain the taste of winning. Amiens receives Brest this Saturday, November 2, for the 12th day of Ligue 1. Players Luka Elsner are 14th in the standings with 13 points in 11 games.
For its part, Brest remains on 3 consecutive victories against Dijon (2-0), Angers (1-0) and Metz (2-0). Olivier Dall'Aglio's men are 5th in the standings with 17 points in 11 games.








Amiens - Brest on TV




Olivier Dall'Oglio, coach of Brest + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This match between Amiens and Brest is broadcast live on television on Bein Sports 4, this Saturday, October 2nd. The kickoff will be given at 8 pm
